title: QR Codes
text:
QR codes
Source: Scanning QR codes in R
Packages: opencv, qrcode
Reading QR codes from an image

img <-  opencv::ocv_read('https://jeroen.github.io/images/qrtest.jpg')
opencv::ocv_qr_detect(img)

Reading QR codes from the camera

# This requires a camera
txt <- opencv::qr_scanner()

Generating a QR code image

png("qr-test.png")
plot(qrcode::qr_code("This is a test!"))
dev.off()

title: geocoding
text:
Geocoding addresses
Source: Geocode address text strings using tidygeocoder
Packages: tidygeocoder

library(tidygeocoder)
library(dplyr)

 df <- data.frame(text_to_geocode = c("Bologna, Italy", "Parma, Italy"))
 
 df %>% 
    geocode(text_to_geocode, method = "osm")

# A tibble: 2 Ã— 3
  text_to_geocode   lat  long
  <chr>           <dbl> <dbl>
1 Bologna, Italy   44.5  11.3
2 Parma, Italy     44.8  10.3
